title: 90 Minutes in Heaven
writer: Michael Polish, Don Piper, Cecil Murphey
short_cast: Hayden Christensen, Kate Bosworth, Dwight Yoakam, Michael W. Smith, Fred Thompson, Michael Harding, Marshall Bell, Cynthia Barrett
cast: Hayden Christensen, Kate Bosworth, Dwight Yoakam, Michael W. Smith, Fred Thompson, Michael Harding, Marshall Bell, Cynthia Barrett

desc: Some 90 minutes after authorities pronounced him dead at the scene of an accident, a young pastor comes back to life and claims he's been to heaven.
